entry.title: any title
entry.content:
😊Welcome friend! If you want to know more about me, please click the tag above for more details!

Personal News!

2024

[2024/07/21]✈I have come back to Chengdu.

[2024/07/19]⚜️ I have made a report today in 2024 IEEE AP-S!

[2024/07/17]⚜️ I have made a report today in 2024 IEEE AP-S!

[2024/07/12]✈We are in group to attend the 2024 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (USNC-URSI), Florance, Italy.

[2024/05/01]🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “Matrix-Pencil-Based Waterflow Velocity Detection Method by 24 GHz Millimetre-Wave Radar” in IEEE Antennas and Propagation Letters!

[2024/04/07]🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 conference articles in 2024 International Conference on Microwave and Millimeter Wave Technology (ICMMT2024), Beijing, China!

[2024/03/29]🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 2 conference articles in 2024 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (USNC-URSI), Florance, Italy!

[2024/03/27]🎇Congratulations on the win of the Academic Up-and-Coming Star Prize Scholarship of UESTC (2024), values RMB 3000!

[2024/03/25]:triangular_flag_on_post: An article named “Matrix-Pencil-Based Waterflow Velocity Detection Method by 24 GHz Millimetre-Wave Radar” has been revised and resubmitted to IEEE Antennas and Propagation Letters.

[2024/03/24]✈I have come back to Chengdu for normal work and life.

[2024/03/06]🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “A Nonlinear Manifold Embedding Extreme Learning Machine to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Nose” in IEEE Sensors Journal!

[2024/03/01]🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “Adaptive Gradient Projection Correction Method for Resistivity Array Imaging Logging” in IEEE Sensors Journal!
